WorkItem.Description:
I used Rawr Addon once since the release of 4.3 without issue. I updated the addon from Curse when i saw an update availible. 
I now receive a Lua error message. I dont know if the update is bugged or if another issue exsists.  Any ideas?
Message: Interface\AddOns\Rawr\Locales\Locale-enUS.lua:2: attempt to call global 'LibStub' (a nil value)
Time: 12/15/11 04:04:35
Count: 1
Stack: Interface\AddOns\Rawr\Locales\Locale-enUS.lua:2: in main chunk
 
Locals: (*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = "AceLocale-3.0"
(*temporary) = "attempt to call global 'LibStub' (a nil value)"
 
 
Thanks for any help
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr Addon giving Lua error message.

I have been using this addon for a long time.  I love it, and I love RAWR.  The only problem with the addon was that the LUA was looking for ranged slots that no longer exist and also the talent tree in the lua needed to be renamed as well.  

I have rewritten the XML and LUA files and it works just fine now.  I want permission to share with people before I go ahead and do so considering this is not my project.  If I get permission I have no problems sharing my work.
